html: It’s been five years and Flint residents still aren’t able to trust they have clean drinking water. America is one of the wealthiest countries on the planet. It’s a disgrace that we can’t guarantee access to clean water for everyone. I will never forget about the people of Flint.

html: Right now in America the federal minimum wage is $7.25/hour, averaging about $15,000 a year. When the majority of minimum wage workers are women, we can’t deny the fact that this isn’t enough to feed your family or pay for childcare. Time to raise the wage to $15.

A stunning statistic: In 2015, 92% of all women killed by guns in high-income countries lived in the United States. 

92%. 

That is shameful. I will close the “boyfriend loophole” and prevent dating partners convicted of domestic violence from purchasing guns.

html: My plan to stand up to the NRA if Congress won’t: Mandate near-universal background checks Revoke the licenses of gun dealers who break the law Ensure fugitives from justice can’t purchase guns Close the “Boyfriend Loophole” to prevent domestic abusers from buying guns
text:
My plan to stand up to the NRA if Congress won’t:
Mandate near-universal background checks
Revoke the licenses of gun dealers who break the law
Ensure fugitives from justice can’t purchase guns
Close the “Boyfriend Loophole” to prevent domestic abusers from buying guns

html: Earth Day is a reminder that we only have one planet. There is no Planet B. We must address the climate crisis and elect a president willing to stand up to polluters and act to protect our environment. Not just for ourselves, but for future generations.

Earth Day is a reminder that we only have one planet. There is no Planet B. 

We must address the climate crisis and elect a president willing to stand up to polluters and act to protect our environment. Not just for ourselves, but for future generations.

html: The federal minimum wage hasn’t moved from $7.25/hour in almost a decade. As president, I will give working Americans the raise they deserve by increasing the minimum wage to $15/hour and making it a living wage.
text: The federal minimum wage hasn’t moved from $7.25/hour in almost a decade. As president, I will give working Americans the raise they deserve by increasing the minimum wage to $15/hour and making it a living wage.

html: Easter is a reminder that there is hope and rebirth even in the darkest of times. We must remember that today, more than ever. I am horrified by the attacks in Sri Lanka, where so many families were celebrating such a joyous day. Praying for the victims and their loved ones.
text:
Easter is a reminder that there is hope and rebirth even in the darkest of times. We must remember that today, more than ever. 

I am horrified by the attacks in Sri Lanka, where so many families were celebrating such a joyous day. Praying for the victims and their loved ones.

html: We must embrace paper ballots and upgrades to our election infrastructure in 2020. Russia and other foreign adversaries cannot hack a piece of paper like they can a computer. Every voter deserves to have their vote counted. It’s imperative we work now to protect our elections.

html: Our nation's leaders should have acted to end gun violence in schools after Columbine. After Virginia Tech. After Northern Illinois University. After Sandy Hook. After Umpqua Community College. After Parkland. After Santa Fe High School. Inner City schools. How many more?

Our nation's leaders should have acted to end gun violence in schools after Columbine. 
After Virginia Tech. 
After Northern Illinois University. 
After Sandy Hook.
After Umpqua Community College.
After Parkland. 
After Santa Fe High School.
Inner City schools.

How many more?

html: The average teacher makes about $1,000 less than they did 30 years ago. Our teachers are underpaid, undervalued & overworked. As President, I’ll pass the largest federal investment in teacher pay in American history to ensure they don’t have to take on 2-3 jobs to pay the bills.
text:
The average teacher makes about $1,000 less than they did 30 years ago. Our teachers are underpaid, undervalued & overworked.

As President, I’ll pass the largest federal investment in teacher pay in American history to ensure they don’t have to take on 2-3 jobs to pay the bills.

html: California North Carolina Colorado Arizona Georgia Teachers across the country have organized to demand better wages, benefits, and the resources they need to educate our children. As president, I will stand with them and pay them their worth.
text:
California
 North Carolina
 Colorado
 Arizona

Teachers across the country have organized to demand better wages, benefits, and the resources they need to educate our children. As president, I will stand with them and pay them their worth.

html: In our criminal justice system, a single mother can be held in jail awaiting trial for days, weeks, months, or even years  — not because she’s a threat to her community, but simply because she cannot afford to make bail. That’s wrong and why we must reform our bail system.

In our criminal justice system, a single mother can be held in jail awaiting trial for days, weeks, months, or even years  — not because she’s a threat to her community, but simply because she cannot afford to make bail. 

That’s wrong and why we must reform our bail system.

html: As president, I will raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour and make sure it’s a living wage. It’s unconscionable that in 99% of the counties in America, a minimum-wage worker working full-time still cannot afford the market rate for a one-bedroom apartment.
text:
As president, I will raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour and make sure it’s a living wage. 

It’s unconscionable that in 99% of the counties in America, a minimum-wage worker working full-time still cannot afford the market rate for a one-bedroom apartment.

It’s unbelievable. The NRA is trying to block the Violence Against Women Act, which helps survivors of domestic and sexual assault, because part of the bill would seek to keep guns out of the hands of abusers.

html: I was always sick as a child due to an immune disorder & couldn’t go out for recess in the cold Ohio winters. So I stayed in every day with my first grade teacher Mr. Martin. He taught me about not just subjects but the way to live your life which I still carry with me today!
text: I was always sick as a child due to an immune disorder & couldn’t go out for recess in the cold Ohio winters. So I stayed in every day with my first grade teacher Mr. Martin. He taught me about not just subjects but the way to live your life which I still carry with me today!

html: My music teacher Mr. Lonnie Thomas was an impactful influence on me as an artist and as a person. He provided opportunities for me to compose and saw the potential in me which at that time I didn’t see.
text: My music  teacher Mr. Lonnie Thomas was an impactful influence on me as an artist and as a person. He provided opportunities for me to compose and saw the potential in me which at that time I didn’t see.

html: I flunked 7th grade math but when I got to high school Mr. Wright taught algebra with such clarity and grace that I found a passion for the subject and went on to study physics and math in college. Truly a great teacher and human being.
text: I flunked 7th grade math but when I got to high school Mr. Wright taught algebra with such clarity and grace that I found a passion for the subject and went on to study physics and math in college. Truly a great teacher and human being.

html: My 10th grade English teach Kyla Ward noticed I needed glasses badly, and would always email me inexpensive ways to get my eyes checked and pay for glasses until I was able to do so.

html: Our nation's leaders should have acted to end gun violence after Sandy Hook. After Charleston. After San Bernardino. After Pulse. After Sutherland Springs. After Las Vegas. After the Tree of Life Synagogue. After Parkland. After Thousand Oaks. How many more?

Our nation's leaders should have acted to end gun violence after Sandy Hook. 
After Charleston. 
After San Bernardino. 
After Pulse. 
After Sutherland Springs. 
After Las Vegas.
After the Tree of Life Synagogue. 
After Parkland. 
After Thousand Oaks. 

How many more?

html: World-renowned ballerina Maria Tallchief was repeatedly told she should change her name so dance companies wouldn’t discriminate against her because of her Native American ancestry. html: Under the Post-9/11 GI Bill, members of our military can transfer unused education benefits to a spouse or child, but this doesn’t apply across the board to foster children and legal wards. My colleagues and I introduced a common-sense fix to make those benefits universal.
text: Under the Post-9/11 GI Bill, members of our military can transfer unused education benefits to a spouse or child, but this doesn’t apply across the board to foster children and legal wards. My colleagues and I introduced a common-sense fix to make those benefits universal.

html: As a child, Marla Runyan developed Stargardt’s Disease which left her legally blind. An avid athlete since age 3, she started focusing on track when she could no longer see the soccer ball. html: Shirley Chisholm had guts. She had guts to oppose the Vietnam War. The guts to run for president in 1972. The guts to speak uncomfortable truths. To ensure her legacy continues to endure and thrive I’ve reintroduced a bill to place a statue of her in our nation’s Capitol.

html: Don’t forget how this “national emergency” happened: →Congress denied the President funding for his wall →He shut down the government, throwing lives into chaos (costing the economy $11B) → Bypassed Congress to declare a national emergency We can’t stand for this.
text:
Don’t forget how this “national emergency” happened:
→Congress denied the President funding for his wall
→He shut down the government, throwing lives into chaos (costing the economy $11B)
→ Bypassed Congress to declare a national emergency

We can’t stand for this.

The Voter Empowerment Act would:
Ensure equal access to the ballot for every eligible voter
Modernize our voter registration system
Protect the integrity of our elections

It’s time our elections better reflected the will of the people.

html: What’s happening in Venezuela is a crisis. The people who have fled Maduro’s dictatorial regime deserve safety and protection. As President, I would immediately extend TPS status to Venezuelans. It’s the right thing to do. America must show moral leadership in this hemisphere.

text:
‘You say you love your children, but you are destroying our future.’

Our sea levels are rising.
Droughts are worsening.
Wildfires are spreading.
Storms are coming.

html: BREAKING: Our anti-lynching bill, which would make lynching a federal crime, just unanimously passed the Senate. Lynching is a dark, despicable part of our nation's history and I'm hopeful this measure will swiftly pass the House.

html: It’s outrageous that lynching still isn’t considered a federal crime. Congress tried and failed near 200 times between 1882 to 1986. About to ask the Senate to unanimously pass our anti-lynching bill. Let’s right this wrong.

html: We’re one of the wealthiest countries on the planet. It’s shameful that we can’t guarantee access to clean water for everyone. Four years since the nation's attention turned to Flint, that community and others from Appalachia to the Pacific Coast still face a water crisis.
text:
We’re one of the wealthiest countries on the planet. It’s shameful that we can’t guarantee access to clean water for everyone. 

Four years since the nation's attention turned to Flint, that community and others from Appalachia to the Pacific Coast still face a water crisis.

html: The costs of prescription drugs are too high in our country and they just keep rising. We need to act to reduce prescription drug costs so no family will ever have to choose between paying for life-saving medication or putting food on the table. #SOTU

html: Just a reminder that this State of the Union Address was originally pushed back because Trump shut down the government for 35 days — the longest shutdown in U.S. history. And in fewer than 10 days, there’s a chance he will shut it down again over his vanity project. #SOTU
text: Just a reminder that this State of the Union Address was originally pushed back because Trump shut down the government for 35 days — the longest shutdown in U.S. history. And in fewer than 10 days, there’s a chance he will shut it down again over his vanity project. #SOTU

html: Americans are now more likely to die from an opioid overdose than in a car crash. We must invest more resources to help those suffering from addiction. #SOTU
text: Americans are now more likely to die from an opioid overdose than in a car crash. We must invest more resources to help those suffering from addiction. #SOTU

html: Let’s be clear: Trump’s tax cuts to massive corporations showered profits onto their shareholders, leaving most middle-class Americans behind. #SOTU

html: Building an economy that works for everyone won’t be easy, but it is possible — and necessary. Let’s start with the basics: a living minimum wage and affordable health care for all. #SOTU
text: Building an economy that works for everyone won’t be easy, but it is possible — and necessary. Let’s start with the basics: a living minimum wage and affordable health care for all. #SOTU

html: Nearly half of Americans don't have enough cash to cover an unexpected $400 expense. For far too long, the rules have favored the top 1% instead of working families. We have to correct course and pass the LIFT Act. #SOTU

html: We will fight for an America where our daughters, sisters, mothers, and grandmothers are respected where they live and where they work. Where reproductive rights are not just protected by the Constitution but guaranteed in every state.

html: These are not ordinary times or an ordinary election. But this is our America. It’s up to every one of us to heal this nation. We can give our children the future they deserve. We can restore America’s moral leadership on this planet. Let’s do it together.http://kamalaharris.org

html: The doubters will say what they always say: It’s not your time. The odds are long. It can’t be done. But our story has never been written by the doubters or the naysayers. Robert Kennedy said it best. “Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.”

html: I’m running to fight for Medicare for All, universal pre-K, debt-free college & more. To guarantee middle-class families a pay increase of up to $500/mo with the largest working-class tax cut in decades — paid for by reversing this Admin’s gifts to big corporations & the top 1%.

html: Let’s speak the truth that too many unarmed black men and women are killed. And too many Black and brown Americans are locked up. From mass incarceration to cash bail to policing, our criminal justice system needs drastic repair.
text: Let’s speak the truth that too many unarmed black men and women are killed. And too many Black and brown Americans are locked up. From mass incarceration to cash bail to policing, our criminal justice system needs drastic repair.

html: Climate change is real and it’s happening now. From wildfires in the west to hurricanes in the east to floods and droughts in America’s heartland, we must speak this truth based on science fact, not science fiction.
text: Climate change is real and it’s happening now. From wildfires in the west to hurricanes in the east to floods and droughts in America’s heartland, we must speak this truth based on science fact, not science fiction.

html: Our economy isn’t working for working people. The cost of living is going up, but paychecks aren’t keeping up. People are drowning in debt. For the first time, we have a whole generation of Americans living with the sinking belief that they may not do as well as their parents.
text: Our economy isn’t working for working people. The cost of living is going up, but paychecks aren’t keeping up. People are drowning in debt. For the first time, we have a whole generation of Americans living with the sinking belief that they may not do as well as their parents.

html: When American families are living paycheck to paycheck, what is this Administration’s response? They tried to take away health insurance from millions, gave away a trillion $ to the biggest corporations in America & tried to blame immigrants as the source of our economic woes.
text: When American families are living paycheck to paycheck, what is this Administration’s response? They tried to take away health insurance from millions, gave away a trillion $ to the biggest corporations in America & tried to blame immigrants as the source of our economic woes.

html: We have leaders who lie, bully, attack a free press, and undermine our democratic institutions. We’ve had children in cages crying for their mothers and fathers. We have leaders who attack public schools and vilify public school teachers. That’s not our America.
text: We have leaders who lie, bully, attack a free press, and undermine our democratic institutions. We’ve had children in cages crying for their mothers and fathers. We have leaders who attack public schools and vilify public school teachers. That’s not our America.

html: The American Dream and our American democracy are under attack and on the line like never before. We must answer a fundamental question: who are we as Americans? So, let’s answer that question. To the world. To each other. Right here. Right now. America, we are better than this.
text:
The American Dream and our American democracy are under attack and on the line like never before. We must answer a fundamental question: who are we as Americans? So, let’s answer that question. To the world. To each other. Right here. Right now.

America, we are better than this.

html: The last couple of years, ‘For The People’ has meant fighting to hold this Administration accountable, and in that battle, I’ve seen the spirit of the American people. We’ve won and we’ve lost — but we’ve never stopped fighting.
text: The last couple of years, ‘For The People’ has meant fighting to hold this Administration accountable, and in that battle, I’ve seen the spirit of the American people. We’ve won and we’ve lost — but we’ve never stopped fighting.

html: ‘For The People’ meant fighting for middle-class families who had been defrauded by banks and lost their homes in the Great Recession. We went after the five biggest banks in the U.S. and won $20B for CA homeowners and passed the strongest anti-foreclosure laws in the country.
text: ‘For The People’ meant fighting for middle-class families who had been defrauded by banks and lost their homes in the Great Recession. We went after the five biggest banks in the U.S. and won $20B for CA homeowners and passed the strongest anti-foreclosure laws in the country.

html: Nearly 30 years ago, as a young district attorney, I walked into the courtroom for the first time and said the five words that would guide my life’s work: “Kamala Harris, for The People.”
